channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ICE and Border Patrol shootings spark hundreds of weekend vigils and protests
item.description: Data: Mobilize ; Map: Kavya Beheraj/Axios "ICE Out For Good" vigils and protest events were quickly planned nationwide for Jan. 10 and 11 in response ...

item.title: Democrats warm to impeaching Kristi Noem after Minneapolis, Portland shootings
item.description: Democrats who wanted to impeach Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem were on the fringes. Then the shootings in Minneapolis and Portland happened. ...

item.title: Poll: Americans say ICE is "too forceful" — and support protests against the agency
item.description: Americans now disapprove of ICE and support protests against the agency, according to a new poll conducted the same day a federal officer fatally shot...

item.title: China's fentanyl crackdown led to a stunning drop in U.S. overdoses, research says
item.description: Data: CDC ; Chart: Axios Visuals Chinese crackdowns on fentanyl may have reduced overdoses and saved American lives, new research shows. Why it matter...

item.title: Exclusive: DNC flags legal risks in Trump DOJ voter roll request
item.description: The Democratic National Committee on Thursday sent letters to officials in 10 states urging them to reject a Justice Department request for unredacted...

item.title: Coast Guard prepares for influx of seized ‘ghost fleet’ oil tankers

item.title: Trump says he will meet Machado — and would accept Nobel Peace Prize from her
item.description: Nobel officials said Friday that the prize may not be shared or transferred.

item.title: In combative news conference, Vance defends Minneapolis ICE shooting
item.description: The vice president accused a woman who was shot dead by an ICE agent Wednesday of criminally trying to ram the officer, whom he described as acting in...

item.title: Tracking who Trump is appointing to fill key administration roles
item.description: Follow President Trump’s progress filling over 800 positions, among about 1,300 that require Senate confirmation, in this tracker from The Washington ...

item.title: Judge disqualifies U.S. attorney in Albany investigating Letitia James
item.description: John A. Sarcone III is the fifth Trump-appointed interim U.S. attorney who has been disqualified from serving in such a role.

item.title: Ex-Trump voters swung hard to Democrats over costs in NJ & VA, new research shows
item.description: Voters who backed Donald Trump in 2024 and swung to Democrats in this year's Virginia and New Jersey elections did so over economic concerns, accordin...

item.title: Vance tries to thread affordability needle in Rust Belt
item.description: The vice president fine-tunes Trump’s economic message, but he's only got so much wiggle room.

item.title: Democrats think they’ve found their 2026 message — and Miami just backed it up
item.description: In races across the country, Democrats focused on promises to make life more affordable — even as they offered contrasting approaches.

item.title: Voters sour on Trump’s handling of the economy in new poll
item.description: The White House plans to make affordability a key selling point for Republicans across the board as the 2026 midterm elections come into focus.

item.title: Trump will again test ‘blame Democrats’ message on the economy — this time at a casino

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
